:::{#thm-diff-loghaz}
#### Difference of log-hazards vs hazard ratio
$$\diffloghaz(t|\vx : \vxs)= \logf{\theta(t| \vx : \vxs)}$$
:::

---

::: proof

$$
\ba
\diffloghaz(t|\vx : \vxs)
&\eqdef \loghaz(t|\vx) - \loghaz(t|\vxs)
\\
&= \logf{\haz(t|\vx)} - \logf{\haz(t|\vxs)}
\\
&= \logf{\frac{\haz(t|\vx)}{\haz(t|\vxs)}}
\\
&= \logf{\theta(t| \vx : \vxs)}
\ea
$$

:::
